how_long_does_it_take_to_make_glasses: How long does it take to make glasses?
do_you_replace_lenses_in_existing_frames: Do you replace lenses in existing frames?
do_you_provide_blue_light_filter_glasses: Do you provide blue light filter glasses?
answer_where_is_your_shop: Our optical shop is JYOTI NETRA SEVA & JYOTI CHASHMA SAGAR located at College Road, Zamania Railway Station, Ghazipur, UP, India, Pin 232331.
answer_what_are_your_timings: We are open daily from 08 AM to 08 PM.
answer_do_you_provide_eye_testing: Yes, we offer free computerized eye testing in-store.
answer_do_you_sell_prescription_glasses: Yes, we provide prescription glasses with single vision, bifocal, and progressive lenses.
answer_do_you_sell_branded_frames: Yes, we stock brands like Ray-Ban, Oakley, Fastrack, Vogue, and more.
answer_do_you_have_budget_frames: Yes, we have stylish frames starting from just Rs. 300.
answer_do_you_sell_contact_lenses: Yes, we sell daily, monthly, and yearly contact lenses from leading brands.
answer_do_you_sell_colored_lenses: Yes, colored cosmetic lenses are available in multiple shades.
answer_do_you_provide_home_delivery: Yes, we provide home delivery for glasses and lenses within the city.
answer_how_long_does_it_take_to_make_gla: It usually takes 1–3 days depending on the lens type.
answer_do_you_repair_glasses: Yes, we provide frame adjustments and minor repairs.
answer_do_you_replace_lenses_in_existing: Yes, bring your frame and we will fit new lenses.
answer_do_you_have_kids_frames: Yes, we have a wide collection of lightweight and durable kids’ frames.
answer_do_you_provide_blue_light_filter_: Yes, we have anti-glare and blue light blocking lenses for computer/mobile use.
answer_do_you_sell_sunglasses: Yes, we stock polarized and UV-protected sunglasses in many styles.
answer_can_i_get_progressive_lenses: Yes, progressive / multifocal lenses are available.
answer_do_you_provide_warranty: Yes, most frames and lenses come with warranty.
answer_do_you_accept_digital_payments: Yes, we accept UPI, debit/credit cards, and net banking.
answer_do_you_provide_discounts: Yes, we have seasonal discounts and special offers on select brands.
answer_do_you_have_corporate_tie_ups: Yes, we offer bulk/corporate packages for companies.
answer_can_i_book_an_appointment: Yes, you can call or WhatsApp us to book an eye test appointment.
scan_or_click: Scan us or click the button to rate
